content:
What truly defines us as humans?
Is it love...or hate?
Our dreams...or our nightmares?
Is it our sins...or our passions?
Our hierarchy...our wealth?
Our social media
Or maybe our lack thereof?
Jobs, education...
Family or friends?

There are no right or
wrong answers,
We choose to create
Our own definitions.
Some may agree to disagree,
But we are all human
Breathe air
Bleed red,
Yet we are uniquely different,
Beautifully colourful
Through the mind and soul.

Every existence is meaningful,
Whether it be good or bad.
So only one question remains...
What is your purpose?

There's no point
rushing ingenuity,
the turtle may be slow,
but will end up
as the most victorious
of them all.

Every journey has a
beginning,
with an unforseen future.
But do not be disheartened,
one must always gather courage
to take the first step forward,
to slowly learn to walk
before running
into the unknown.

Falling is inevitable,
but to pursue happiness
a price must be paid,
whether it be by blood,
sweat or tears,
the silver spoon of prosperity
must be rightfully earned.

I wish you luck and good fortune
my dear friend,
success will bring you great joy,
but never forget
the pain and suffering endured,
on this sacred path
to your ultimate destiny.

Taking me by my delicate hands,
you pulled me up
promising that this is my last fall,
promising that you won't let go.

As my feet nestled into your footprints,
a wave of peace washed over me,
that the world wasn't as I thought,
that my turn of happiness has finally come.

As you spun and grabbed me,
I froze
lost within the ocean
of your soulful eyes,
slipping away slowly
into your world of fantasy.

As I lose grip on reality
you catch me softly,
sending quivers down my spine.

As your gaze intensifies,
I realise you're the missing piece
to the never-ending puzzle of my life.

Forget everything that's happened,
this single moment,
encapsulates a mysterious aura,
undefinable by any means.

No matter what
I would never let go,
believing that you'll forever hold my hand,
as I rest in the embers of your heart.

When one door
closes
break down that
door,
don't wait
for another door
to open.

content:
Love is like a flower,
care for it carefully
and it will blossom
endlessly.
Of course Mother Nature
is always there,
to take these budding passions
through the seasons of life.
But from the moment you forget,
or choose to forget,
it will slowly begin to wither
and will never be the same.
Every flower is precious,
just remember to take care
of each and every one of them.

content:
In the search for a soulmate,
you may lose yourself
whilst creating an image of
perfection,
within the bubble of society.

Consumed by infatuations,
we fail to realise
the pure essence of soul,
that there's more to someone
than what meets the eye.

It's scary to let go of oneself
strip bare naked
in this stone-cold judging
world of ours,
every carefully concealed
secret,
revealed painstakingly in all
its glory,
shinning blindingly
in the limelight.

But it has to be done,
to unveil the delicate beauty
behind the featherlight strokes
of imperfections within ourselves,
every bloody scar...
every silent teardrop...
every torn-up memory that is buried
beneath an elaborate mask of idealism.

A true warrior
must learn to fight
their own battles,
unlocking the fears you possess,
that's the key to your happiness,
and the first step to the
subliminal world of romance.

Be brave.
Don't underestimate
how special you are,
because loving yourself for who you are
will open you up to the soulmate
who you've been searching for...

content:
Don't wait for New Year
new month
or a new day,
don't wait for tomorrow,
do it today.

Live as you are
For you are more
beautiful
Than those who
are blind
To inner beauty.

Just take a deep breath,
close your eyes
and let the music take
over you...
hear the thrumming of the rain
against the windows
as the trees dance
to nature's lullaby of
the howling night winds outside.
Snuggled up
on a comfy couch,
all wrapped up warm
in a soft blanket,
holding a sweet mug of
hot chocolate,
dozens of
tiny soft marshmallows
gently bobbing on top...
the melody of the rain
falls faintly into my ears,
as I take a nice soothing sip
and settle into
my own wandering thoughts...

To those who
see me
with their eyes,
I may seem happy,
but sometimes
sadness cannot
be seen,
it can only be
understood
by those who
have truly felt
it.

Respect Trust Love

Respect the ones
you truly care for.

Trust that
they won't ever
intentionally hurt you.

Love them
for who they really are.
